FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Product Request message.

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Product Request Message that was processed.

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Used to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: PROD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the product

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the PROD-TYPE field from the Product Request message.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-29. Product Categories)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: PROD-MSGS-TO-SEND
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of Product Msgs that will be published to satisfy the PROD REQ. A value of “-1” can be used to indicate “Unknown”.

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-FILES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the number of files included in this response message.

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URI specifying the location where the file of the product is stored

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file name

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format.

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version ID of the file

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Size of the included file

FIELD.NAME: FILE.1.DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The file content
